1.name: Verdict
1.details:
Justice’s abilities apply Verdict to enemies hit.

If 3 stacks are accumulated, the target will take a burst of true damage (scaling with magical power).

2.name: Smiting Force
2.details: Justice creates 3 powerful spheres and launches each sphere in a target direction per cast, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power).

3.name: Heaven’s Will
3.details: Justice creates a rectangle zone that deals magical damage (scaling with magical power) and slow any enemy passing through.

4.name: Divine Retribution
4.details: Justice creates a circular zone which burst up after a short delay, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) and knocks all enemies up.

5.name: Judgement
5.details:
Justice uses the ultimate power of the creation god, granting sight globally for the next few seconds.

Recasting the ability will release Judgement in a target area after a short delay, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all enemies within.

Enemies hit by the inner range of Judgement take more damage. The closer the target location is toward Justice, the faster he channels.
